# ğŸŒ Web3 Skills **Claude Code Plugin Marketplace** [![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)](https://github.com/icehugh/web3-skills/blob/main/LICENSE) [![GitHub release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/icehugh/web3-skills)](https://github.com/icehugh/web3-skills/releases) [ä¸­æ–‡æ–‡æ¡£](./README.zh-CN.md) | [å®‰è£…æŒ‡å—](#-installation) | [ä½¿ç”¨æ–‡æ¡£](#-usage)
## ğŸ¯ About Web3 Skills is a Claude Code plugin marketplace that provides Web3 development tools and skills. ## ğŸ—„ï¸ Available Plugins ### Walrus TypeScript SDK AI skills for Walrus decentralized storage development, including code generation, debugging, and performance optimization. ## ğŸš€ Installation ### Prerequisites - **Claude Code** installed and configured ### Install Marketplace ```bash /plugin marketplace add icehugh/web3-skills ``` ### Install Plugin ```bash /plugin install walrus-ts@web3-skills ``` ## ğŸ“– Usage Ask Claude for help with Walrus development: ```bash "I need to upload files to Walrus storage from a Node.js backend" ``` Claude will activate the appropriate Walrus skills and provide code generation, error diagnosis, or optimization assistance based on your request. ## ğŸ“„ License This project is licensed under the MIT License - see the [LICENSE](./LICENSE) file for details. ---
